Interface Extrinsics


  • public interface Extrinsics

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getReferenceSensorIndex()
      Returns the reference sensor index uses for extrinsics calculation.
      SensorType getReferenceSensorType()
      Returns the reference sensor type uses for extrinsics calculation.
      float[][] getRotation()
      Returns column-major 3x3 rotation matrix.
      Float3 getTranslation()
      Returns 3 element translation vector, in meters.
